item.title: Institutional Email Issue
item.description: For some reasons my name_surname@sutd.edu.sg email address was deactivated without notice sometime at the end of October 2017. Unfortunately I’ve discovered it only this week and I’m still trying to reactivate it. I apologize if you recently got an error message while trying to send me an email to that address. Please use the surname.name@gmail.com address instead. I ❤️ ✉️
